StoriesRetold.SRBackstoryDef.title: bowling champion
StoriesRetold.SRBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was known far and wide for being the best slow bowler in [PAWN_possessive] homeland. [PAWN_pronoun] was considered the peak of athleticism by [PAWN_possessive] peers.

StoriesRetold.SRBackstoryDef.title: petty criminal
StoriesRetold.SRBackstoryDef.baseDesc: Growing up, [PAWN_nameDef] spent [PAWN_possessive] time constantly committing heinous crimes such as going sixty-seven miles per hour (107.83 KMPH) in a forty-five mile per hour (72.42 KMPH) zone. Despite being a psychopath, he never actually saw the need to commit any serious crimes. Petty ones were just too fun!
